item.title: Template Generated Array in Velocity
item.author: dave@petzel.email (David Petzel)
item.description: Today I was trying to do something in a velocity template that I found to be a little harder than I would have guessed. I was trying to manually generate an array from within my template. I had a single template that I needed to wrap some super crude IP checking around. I have a couple of ip addresses which are allowed to see the template code, but everyone else should get the boot.
